# dumbells

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package has some simple functions to transform, summarize and perform calculations on weighted and clustered data.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mdgordo/dumbells")
```
